Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions

Class ChoicesPanelController

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions.ChoicesPanelController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputSource
public class ChoicesPanelController extends Object implements InputSource

Gathers user-input from an instance of ChoicesPanel active on the Graphical User Interface.

When a user clicks on a button, sends to the InputMediator the integer corresponding to the button's position in the ChoicesPanel. This integer corresponds to a choice in the Menu from which the ChoicesPanel's buttons are created.

Can be in concurrence with Std input : see ConcreteInputMediator::makeChoice(Menu). The first instance of InputSource to post rules over all others.

See Also:
  • ChoicesPanel

      public ChoicesPanelController(List<ChoiceButton> bList, InputMediator im)
